typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EmpID as short,
		EmpName as string,
		Gender as string,
		Salary as short,
		Dept as string,
		Email as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> EmpInfoCSV
EmpInfoCSV aggregate(Emails = collect(Email)) ~> Aggregate1
